author: Ruslan Salakhutdinov and Andriy Mnih and Geoffrey E Hinton
title: Restricted Boltzmann machines for collaborative filtering
window: We present efficient learning and inference procedures for this class of models and demonstrate that RBMs can be successfully applied to the Netflix data set, containing over 100 million user/movie ratings. We also show that RBMs slightly outperform carefully-tuned SVD models.
